TopicTitle: Kerbal EVA jetpacks stop working after switching to another vessel

Articles.Content:
I landed on the Mun and got each of my 5 kerbals out. I switched to the lander via the tracking station every time for each EVA. When I went to return the kerbals to the ship their EVA packs wouldn’t work. I could deploy them but they wouldn’t do anything.

 KSP2 version: 1.0 (or release, whichever is higher)

Windows 10

CPU: 5600x

GPU: RTX 3060 OC 12GB

Edited February 27, 2023 by Youre_Arent
Added specs
